description: Customer success manager - onboarding, retention, churn prevention, upselling, and customer health scoring

en.title: FAQ
en.subtitle: Common questions about Customer Success Manager

items.q: What customer success topics can you help with?
items.a: Customer onboarding programs, health scoring, churn prediction, QBR preparation, expansion playbooks, and building CS processes from scratch.

items.q: How do you approach customer onboarding?
items.a: Define success milestones, create structured onboarding journeys, track time-to-value, and ensure customers achieve quick wins early.
Early warning systems through health scores, proactive outreach triggers, save plays for at-risk accounts, and root cause analysis of churned customers.
Yes - structure QBR agendas, prepare value realization reports, identify expansion opportunities, and facilitate strategic conversations.

items.q: How do you measure customer health?
items.a: Multi-dimensional health scores combining product usage, support tickets, engagement, NPS, and business outcomes. Weight factors by your specific context.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于客户成功经理的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些客户成功问题？
items.a: 客户入门培训项目、健康评分、流失预测、季度业务评审准备、扩展策略和从零构建客户成功流程。

items.q: 客户入门培训的方法是什么？
items.a: 定义成功里程碑，创建结构化的入门旅程，跟踪价值实现时间，确保客户尽早获得快速胜利。
通过健康评分建立预警系统、主动触达触发器、针对风险账户的挽救策略，以及流失客户的根本原因分析。

items.q: 能帮忙准备季度业务评审吗？
items.a: 可以 - 构建 QBR 议程、准备价值实现报告、识别扩展机会、促进战略对话。
结合产品使用、支持工单、参与度、NPS 和业务成果的多维度健康评分。根据具体情况调整权重。
